definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Ease-of-use reduces training time and eliminates critical paths.
sentences.chinese: 易用性可以減少培訓時間並消除一些苛刻途徑。

sentences.english: The functionality check can be closely followed by a usability check.
sentences.chinese: 功能性檢查之後，可以緊接着進行易用性檢查。

sentences.english: But ease of use makes an enormous difference.
sentences.chinese: 但是在易用性上具有巨大的差異。

sentences.english: Ease of use is also relative to the user.
sentences.chinese: 對於用戶來說，易用性同樣也是相對的。

sentences.english: The ease of use will astound you.
Openoffice. org is an optional office suite, with an emphasis on simplicity and ease of use.
sentences.chinese: 是一個可選的辦公套件，強調簡單性和易用性。

sentences.english: There is always a trade-off between ease of use and security.
sentences.chinese: 易用性與安全性總是存在某種權衡關係。

sentences.english: This will make the application more user-friendly and enhance general usability.
sentences.chinese: 這樣可以使應用程序更具用戶友好性，並增加易用性。

sentences.english: You could even offer alternative consultation services, like usability testing.
sentences.chinese: 你可以提供可以選擇的諮詢服務，如易用性測試。

sentences.english: We contend that the second example is more consumable.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲第二個示例的易用性更好一些。

sentences.english: However, considering control cost and practicability, diphacinone Na-salt was the best choice.
sentences.chinese: 但從滅鼠成本和易用性考慮，敵鼠鈉鹽爲首選。

sentences.english: We want to consider the consumability of this interface.
sentences.chinese: 我們要考慮此接口的易用性。

sentences.english: They discussed some of the business and usability reasons for doing so.
sentences.chinese: 它們討論了這種改進的業務原因和易用性原因。
